short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize any text into bullet points, given that it has at least 50 characters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows users to summarize any text they come across while browsing the internet. There are two ways to access the summarization feature: users can click on the extension icon located at the top right menu of the Chrome browser or they can select a piece of text and right-click to access the simpli5y option without leaving the web page.

Once activated, the simpli5y tool uses advanced natural language processing algorithms to quickly and accurately summarize the selected text. This can be particularly useful for individuals who need to read and analyze large amounts of text quickly or for those who want to get a quick overview of an article or web page before diving into the details.
